name: Heartless (jamie_S, ariah52, LGM (J))
description:
You find yourself in an unfamiliar world ruled by an unfamiliar being. He tells that you must follow his command  in order for him to fulfill his promise, yet uncertainty lingers in his words.

programming and art done by me.

story writing and dialogue done by ariah52

music and sfx done by LGM(J)   

(bandcamp - https://lgmgoblinmusic.bandcamp.com/releases)
